Minecraft Earth R22 Patch Notes – July 31, 2020 我的世界：地球 R22号补丁更新公告 — 2020年7月31日New Stuff! 新东西！Season 6: Tundra! Coming soon! Look out for super cool challenges and chilling rewards in the new upcoming season!
第六赛季：苔原赛季，即将开启！敬请期待新赛季中超级酷炫的挑战和令人胆寒的奖励吧！Activate those Adventure Crystals! We’ve added new adventures for you to explore!
快来激活你的那些冒险水晶！全新冒险亟待开启！



New Mobs & Variants: 新生物与生物变种：Be a pig-time collector! The new Pink Footed Pig can now be found in tappables near you and is ready to be added to your pig-ture perfect collection!
准备成为猪猪收藏家了吗？全新生物 —— 粉脚猪已于你附近的建筑底板可见，快来给你的猪猪图鉴扩扩容吧！




Bug Fixes: Bug修复：
Various bug fixes
修复了一定量的各类bug。






原文地址：https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037822211-Minecraft-Earth-Patch-Notes
